availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James A. Townsend (Webster County, Kentucky, farmer.)

body.p: Webster County, Kentucky, farmer. North Carolina native. Married to Jane Cates Townsend. Father of Abner W. Townsend, Ezekiel W. Townsend, James D. Townsend, John Q. Townsend, and Phil Townsend. Farmer in Webster County, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Webster County, p. 600.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Union County, Hills Precinct, p. 296B.
Tennessee Death Records, 1908-1958, Tennessee State Library and Archives, Nashville, TN, Morgan County Death Certificates, File #15140.
